author: Mike Simpson
method: Heat all of the ingredients, except the kale,  in a large saucepan until boiling. Reduce the heat and simmer gently for a 2-3 hours, or until the peas and pearl barley are soft. Stir in the kale and cook for a further 10-12 minutes, or until the kale is tender. Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
ingredients: 250g/8oz carrots, peeled, diced,  250g/8oz turnips, diced,  2 onions, peeled, diced,  1 celery stalk, diced,  1 leek, white part only, sliced,  75-125g/3-4oz pearl barley,  125g/4oz dried peas, soaked in water for 4-5 hours, drained,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  2.3litres/4 pints lamb or mutton stock,  85g/3oz kale, chopped (optional),  salt and freshly ground black pepper
